channel.title: lOaDiNg AnD Lag oh my god?
channel.description: okay so like if i delete a object, when you come to the place where it was deleted, it still shows up for like 3 secs. during that time u cant move, eat e.c.t. is there any way to fix this?

item.title: lOaDiNg AnD Lag oh my god?
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

oh soz i ddnt say, i did that, but it does it when people tele to the area. is it possible to set a load delay when people tele to like 3 seconds? that would fix it.

Read full topic
item.source: lOaDiNg AnD Lag oh my god?

item.title: lOaDiNg AnD Lag oh my god?
item.dc:creator: @wc4evandeva wc4evandeva
item.description:
@wc4evandeva wrote:

You got to change the log in delay of your players for a tad longer so the server has a chance to load before they do

Read full topic
